column4: I have downloaded the ubuntu desktop iso and am trying to install it on my machine, however it doesn't recognise my SATA RAID and shows two disks
not being funny, but why not try a livecd out, see if you like it enought to get a cheap ide drive
I have a live cd and have been using linux for years, I just need to know if I can now get it to work with my SATA RAID
